segments.pli: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has four things their practice is guaranteed, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti.
segments.en: It’s when a mendicant is ethical, learned, energetic, and wise.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti, yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti.
segments.en: When a mendicant has these four things their practice is guaranteed, and they have laid the groundwork for ending the defilements.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, when a mendicant has four things their practice…

suttaplex.blurb: Unfailing practices: morality, learning, energy, and wisdom.
